definition: Aries (star sign)
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
sheep/goat/CL:頭|头[tou2],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Yang
Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Ak Koyunlu or Aq Qoyunlu Turkoman confederation of eastern Iran (c. 1378-c. 1500)

sentences.english: Pisces will generally not mind if the Aries wants to be the boss.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚通常不會在意白羊是否想成爲老闆。

sentences.english: Pisces lies between Aries and Aquarius in the northern skies.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚位於北方天空中白羊座和寶瓶座之間。

sentences.english: Aries starts eating before everyone else has been seated.
sentences.chinese: 大家都還沒有就座，白羊座就已經開始喫上了。

sentences.english: One of Mary's prize possessions was a little white lamb that her husband had given her.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗有一樣珍貴的東西，就是她丈夫給她的小白羊。

sentences.english: Woah, all you singletons, ohh, even the white kids.
sentences.chinese: 喔，所有的單身者，噢，哪怕是小白羊。

sentences.english: On one hand you have Mars in Aries now, a once in two-year advantage!
sentences.chinese: 一方面，火星位於白羊座，這是兩年一次的有利條件。

sentences.english: Arians are loyal to family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座忠於家庭和朋友。

sentences.english: You will have difficulty listening to the Crab's nagging and negativity.
sentences.chinese: 白羊也難以接受巨蟹的嘮叨和消極。

sentences.english: Aries lover is burning with sexual energy and likes to be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座在性方面能力十足，而且喜歡主導。

sentences.english: Jupiter also darts into Aries mid-year, tripling the mental energy.
sentences.chinese: 木星也會在年中時期撞入白羊，使精神能量臻至三倍。

sentences.english: They are both inclined to act. On the other hand, they are both independent and do not like being controlled.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，天蠍和白羊都很獨立，不喜歡被控制。

sentences.english: I did not understand why it was so important that sheep should eat little bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白羊喫小灌木這件事爲什麼如此重要。

sentences.english: The planets are being little gremlins this month, dear Aries.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的白羊們，這個月的行星有點像小搗蛋鬼。

sentences.english: ARIES: Eats all of the chocolates in one sitting.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座會一口氣喫光所有的巧克力。

sentences.english: Aries pushes the others aside to get to the door first.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座身先士卒，第一個闖進屋門。

sentences.english: Dat widder woman bring her daughters up very nice.
sentences.chinese: 逸白羊座女人把她的女兒了非常好的。
